text: A Smoked Husband is a 1908 American silent comedy movie directed by D. W. GriffithA Smoked HusbandRichard Schickel. D.W. Griffith: An American Life and stars John R. Cumpson, Florence Lawrence, and Linda Arvidson. ==Actors== * John R. Cumpson as Mr. Bibbs * Florence Lawrence as Mrs. Bibbs * Linda Arvidson as Maid * George Gebhardt as Man in Top Hat * Robert Harron as Messenger * Arthur V. Johnson as Policeman * George Nichols * Alfred Paget * Mack Sennett as Man in Top Hat * Harry Solter as Maid's Accomplice * Kate Toncray as Mother ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: A Smoked Husband
